title: Want more data from Boost Mobile? Make sure to pay your bill on time
text:
Want more data from Boost Mobile? Make sure to pay your bill on time 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
With its recently-announced Growing Data plans, Boost Mobile is out to give customers up to 3GB of additional 4G LTE data if they pay their ...
